member.name: T:ScapeCore.Core.Engine.Components.RectTransform
member.summary: Represents a class for defining the transformation of a rectangle in the ScapeCore engine.
member.remarks: This class is derived from the Component class and is used to define the position, rotation, and scale of a rectangle.

member.name: P:ScapeCore.Core.Engine.Components.RectTransform.rectangle
member.summary: Gets or sets the defining the position and size of the rectangle.
member.remarks: The Rectangle property represents the position (X, Y) and size (Width, Height) of the rectangle.

member.name: P:ScapeCore.Core.Engine.Components.RectTransform.rotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation angles (in radians) for the X and Y axes of the rectangle.
member.remarks: The Rotation property represents the rotation angles for the X and Y axes of the rectangle.

member.name: P:ScapeCore.Core.Engine.Components.RectTransform.scale
member.summary: Gets or sets the scaling factors for the X and Y axes of the rectangle.
member.remarks: The Scale property represents the scaling factors for the X and Y axes of the rectangle.

member.name: M:ScapeCore.Core.Engine.Components.RectTransform.#ctor
member.remarks: Initializes a new instance of the RectTransform class with default values (position at (0,0), no rotation, and uniform scale).
